Articles.Content:
So, having the largest rocket I have ever seen in the game, I decided to put a space station in orbit. With one trip.

Pics: http://imgur.com/a/KtB3M#0

Here is the SS-3SS. AKA the SS-3 Space Station Edition. Working on a 2.0, I had so much fuel left.

Requires 0.15.2, Damned Robotics, and MechJeb 1.8.4
u know there are parts and/or retextures of solar panels...

u know there are parts and/or retextures of solar panels...

Yeah, but I didn\'t have one on hand. I will probably redo this soon.
try some of the simple part packs. they usually have solar panels.
